title: Firebase Web App Deployment
des: In this session, speaker will talk about the basics of Firebase and how to deploy the web applications on Firebase. Firebase is a mobile and web application development platform, and as of October 2018, the Firebase platform has 18 products, which are used by 1.5 million apps.

title: Google Cloud Platform
des: Introduction to GCP and the advatnages to use it. Google Cloud Platform is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally for its end-user products, such as Google Search and YouTube.

title: I’m Remarkable
des: #IamRemarkable is a Google initiative empowering women and underrepresented groups to celebrate their achievements in the workplace and beyond. Self Branding and Self promotion will be the topics for hands-on to boost up the confidence level in a person.

title: Why I Can’t?
des: There are 101 reasons for Why we can't, but let's get over those 101 reasons and know the strengths of ourself to get rid of failures and procrastination's reasons.
